title: Lavish Five-Star Qingdao Urban Resort with Beach Access & Five Restaurants & Bars
description:
Experience five-star luxury at this Hyatt Regency property, situated in the heart of Qingdao's vibrant Laoshan District. This seaside sanctuary offers guests a unique blend of urban sophistication and coastal charm, sitting in between Shilaoren Beach and the city's commercial centre. Indulge in an array of culinary delights at the hotel's gourmet restaurants, serving everything from traditional Shandong cuisine to international dishes.

Explore the nearby Laoshan Mountain, known for its stunning natural beauty and historic Taoist temples. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel's tranquil spa for a rejuvenating treatment or enjoy a seasonally inspired afternoon tea at Bay Lounge, complete with panoramic views over Shilaoren Beach and the Yellow Sea.

title: China Modern Qingdao Urban Retreat in the Heart of the City
description: In this seaside city's heart, Crowne Plaza Qingdao Jinshui, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to the treasures of Qingdao. Embark on an adventure to Laoshan Mountain, boasting a panorama of emerald vistas and ornate Taoist temples. Then, journey to the southern coast for sapphire views of the Yellow Sea, before learning more about China's second largest brewery at Tsingtao Brewery Museum. End the day by enjoying authentic Jiaodong cuisine at the onsite Fulin Chinese Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Qingdao Jinshui, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.175-2 Jufeng Road, Licang District, Qingdao 266199, China

title: Lavish Five-Star Qingdao Escape with Five Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Take a coastal escape to Qingdao on China's southern coast at InterContinental Qingdao, an IHG Hotel. Qingdao is famous for hosting the 2008 Summer Olympics sailing events, and this oceanfront hotel overlooks the Olympic torch venue and city horizon. Spend your days soaking in the city's culture, where centuries of history and modern elements combine in stunning architecture. Then, enjoy a dip in the pool and dine at any of the five onsite restaurants, each offering an authentic dining experience.
offer_address: No.98, Ao Men Road, Qingdao, Shandong 266071, China

title: Contemporary China City Break near Qingdao Cinema Studios
description: Near the cinema studios of Qingdao upon the man-made Starlight Island, Crowne Plaza Qingdao Oriental Movie Metropolis, an IHG Hotel exudes a sense of sophistication and style usually reserved for the movies. Venture into cosmopolitan Qingdao for high-end retail therapy, visit Qingdao Food Street for delectable delicacies or visit film sets and theatres to chase that limelight. On your return, sample glamorous global dishes at Caf√© Hollywood restaurant or a refined cocktail in the Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Qingdao Oriental Movie Metropolis, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 818 Xinghaiwan Street, West Coast New District, Qingdao, 266000, Mainland China

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Qingdao Ocean Spring Resort
title: Stunning Qingdao Seaside Stay near Aoshan Bay
description: Steps from the sapphire shores of Aoshan Bay, Crowne Plaza Qingdao Ocean Spring Resort, an IHG Hotel offers a soothing seaside stay only minutes from Qingdao. Float in crystal-clear swimming pools with charming pachyderm water features, soak in ocean hot springs or frolic on golden sands for fun in the sun. When hunger strikes, down a stein of Bavarian-style beer and snacks at the 1928 Tsing Beer Brewery or savour seasonal Japanese cuisine at TENKAI.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Qingdao Ocean Spring Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.188 Binhai Road, Jimo, Qingdao 266200, China

title: Qingdao High-Rise Hotel Minutes from the Seafront
description: In the heart of the city, Crowne Plaza Qingdao, an IHG Hotel, boasts sapphire views and a location only minutes from the seafront. Dine on delicious dishes at Murano restaurant or sample global buffets at Cafe Asia. Invigorate your body at the fitness centre, with an indoor pool, sauna and steam room. Venture out into this cosmopolitan city for retail therapy at nearby shopping malls or visit Qingdao Food Street only minutes away for authentic street food and seafood fresh from the ocean.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Qingdao, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.76 Xiang Gang Zhong Road, Qingdao 266071, China
